web_dev.text: We do not follow agile PROCESS. We stick to the manifesto.
web_dev.sub_text: Processes are made by the non-intelligent people to mimic the intelligent. We believe that the process has compromised the manifesto. We stick with the manifesto and pick the best from XP and Kanban to set a unique process for each customer.

web_dev.text: We are not fond of logging hours.
web_dev.sub_text: As developers, we like to write code and not fill in excel sheets. We often forget logging hours and then we just do not log them. We lose money :(.
We like to put our perspective on every feature and think that we can do it better than you suggest.

web_dev.text: We keep meetings short and to the point.
web_dev.sub_text: We like to talk straight to the point and plan the next steps. Nothing less. Nothing more. Weather discussions do not excite us at all.

mobile_dev.text: We are not fond of hybrid technologies
mobile_dev.sub_text: We’ve tried everything xamarin, phonegap, react and what not. But we only like to stay native and push hard to convince our customers.

mobile_dev.text: We’ve done limited number of projects.
mobile_dev.sub_text: Our mobile development team is still only a few years old and is fairly new. So we only have a fewer projects to claim unlike our web team.

mobile_dev.text: We think everything should be mobile ONLY
mobile_dev.sub_text: Where people think it should be mobile first, we think it should be mobile only.

mobile_dev.text: We’re yet to open our IoT kits.
mobile_dev.sub_text: We ordered beacons and more, but we have not yet gotten to them.

ux_dev.text: We may give you a sarcastic answer if you ask us a stupid question. Can't help!
We advise you to not hold us responsible for the weird faces when you talk to us. No FaceTime please!
Be ready to tell us. Hey guys, hold on. Stop overthinking about a problem.
Beer Fridays are better days at work. You may find us talking more that day. Ahem!
We end up falling in so much love with our work, our restroom breaks get longer during projects.
We do expect you will send Santa during Christmas time. We like Scotch.
When you work with us, we will teach you how to give a high-five over the phone. Not kidding!
We can’t always keep you happy. We are not a bacon.
We will sometimes say hello, without being ready for a conversation.

about_us: We work in a planned fashion. The only thing is that we each have our own plans.
We need you more than you need us.
We'll talk in about 40 different accents in English
After every deployment, we turn unusually religious and call on higher powers.
